ISSUE.TITLE: Add special handling for wp_die
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: We need to add a `wp_die_handler` filter so we can return a response when WordPress evokes `wp_die`. Reference link to how Jetpack handles this: https://github.com/Automattic/jetpack/blob/a8f890c21db29f0d4ec22734fbb19b74cfa45bb1/class.json-api.php#L554

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #790-add-wp-die-handler Fixes #790, 1660, 1784. Adds a wp_die() handler for the WP REST API. Not sure if this is the best implementation. Would love some feedback and will probably mull over it a bit before it is ready for merge.
